ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: I better give %s a treat to keep performing that trick right.
I hope the crowd enjoys this show.
Oh no, %s messed up that trick!
I think %s did a great job on that trick!
Wow, %s did a really good job on that trick!
I bet the next show is going to be even better!
I better clean up for the next show.
Oops, that show left a bit of a mess.
Before too long, %s will totally know this trick.
